body.p: If you are installing a named-user license on multiple machines that you own and use, or you are an administrator registering named-user licenses for multiple users, you can avoid having to open on each machine by registering the license using a text file or an XML file containing the license.

ol.li: Copy the license key to a file named licensekey.txt and place it in the installation folder of or in the lib subfolder of the installation folder.

body.p: To register using an XML file:

ol.li: Register the license on one computer using the normal license procedure.
Copy the license.xml file from the preferences directory of on that computer to the installation directory or the lib subdirectory of each installation to be registered.
